channel.title: berlin on Continuous Testing Meetup
channel.description: Recent content in berlin on Continuous Testing Meetup

item.title: Critical Thinking in Testing and in Life - Online Meetup & Open Discussion
item.description:
Talks:
Testing and life through critical thinking and creativity (Stephanie Frias)

item.title: How to Work at Home and Not Go Insane - Online Meetup & Open Discussion
item.description:
Talks:
Tips and best practices on how to stay effective while working remotely (Laszlo Simity)

item.title: CTM in February @ BITGRIP
item.description:
Talks:
Design for Failure (Italo Vietro)
Personal growth: teaching yourself & learning from the community (Sakhi Mansoor)

item.title: CTM in January @ Contentful
item.description:
Talks:
Your locators are fragile! Make them strong with test data attributes (Anil Kumar Krishnashetty)
Contract Testing from the trenches (Enrique Amodeo & Sergiy Tupchiy)

item.title: CTM in December @ myToys
item.description:
Talks:
The Changing Role of the Test Manager (Aksana Matulskaya)
Modern Testmanagement @myToys (Irina Herlein)

item.title: CTM @ FlixBus - AI in Test Automation
item.description:
Talks:
Testing conversational AI: The Rise of The Bot (Christoph Börner)
Using AI to automate test case decision (Noemí Ferrera)

item.title: CTM in October @ WeWork Stralauer Allee
item.description:
Talks:
Extending Robot Framework with custom Keywords - presenting possibilities of a versatile testing framework (Nils Balkow-Tychsen)
Optimizing iOS Startup Performance and Analyzing Its Internals (Umut Uzgur)
Continuous Testing and Mobile DevOps (Moataz Nabil)

item.title: CTM in September @ Vivy
item.description:
Talks:

item.title: CTM in June @ WeWork Stralauer Allee
